basics: values appear to be transmitted byte-wide with the MSB first

fields appear one nibble wide, here clustered as bytes
(as checksum is on bytes too):


unknown  chksum   fan/stat chksum   tmp/mode chksum

10110010 01001101 01111011 10000100 11100000 00011111  OFF
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01110000 10001111  ON

10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 00000000 11111111  17 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 00010000 11101111  18 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 00110000 11001111  19 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 00100000 11011111  20 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01100000 10011111  21 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01110000 10001111  22 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01010000 10101111  23 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01000000 10111111  24 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 11000000 00111111  25 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 11010000 00101111  26 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 10010000 01101111  27 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 10000000 01111111  28 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 10100000 01011111  29 °C
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 10110000 01001111  30 °C

10110010 01001101 10011111 01100000 00100000 11011111 Fan low
10110010 01001101 01011111 10100000 00100000 11011111 Fan med
10110010 01001101 00111111 11000000 00100000 11011111 Fan high
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 00100000 11011111 Fan auto

10110010 01001101 00011111 11100000 01110100 10001011 mode: dry
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01111100 10000011 mode: heat
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 11100100 00011011 mode: fan
10110010 01001101 00011111 11100000 01111000 10000111 mode: auto
10110010 01001101 10111111 01000000 01110000 10001111 mode: cool

10110101 01001010 11110101 00001010 10100010 01011101 Turbo toggle (magic)
10110101 01001010 11110101 00001010 10100101 01011010 LED toggle (magic)


fan: hardcoded values, decreasing value in high 3 bits, auto is 101
temperature: ?
 * not linear?
 * encoding?
 * *almost* regular binary with offset 17 in high 4 bits
mode: hardcoded, "fan" mode appears to be "dry" mode with invalid temperature?
chksum: second byte is always inversion of first

toggle/*magic* values: constant, independant of other changes
(sadly, so no real control of these, since we can't know current state)
